DOC.brief_title: Visual Performance Investigation Two Toric Soft Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: Sign inform consent ; Wears toric soft contact lenses ; Can successfully fit study lens within power range available ; Has cylinder â‰¥ 0.75 diopter eye ; Has correctable vision least 0.1 ( logMAR ) good eye distance study lenses ; Willing able wear study lenses daily wear basis least 5 day week , minimum 8 hour per day , attend study visit ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular condition would contraindicate contact lens wear ; Use medication contact lens wear could contraindicate ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens ; History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery , irregular cornea ; Known sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study ; Requires presbyopic correction ; Use rewetting/lubricating eyedrop twice day ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
